content:
V Nemčiji je tip pohakoval naokoli z lokom zaradi česar so zaskrbljeni lokalci poklicali policijo in ko so ga štirje policisti imeli v postopku jih je nekako presenetil, naperil v njih orožje (nekje piše, da je šlo za pištolo, drugje govorijo o loku) ter jih razorožil in zaplenil njihove pištole ter jo ucvru v gozd, kjer ga zdaj na polno iščejo.
Tole bi bilo za v kak topic "saj ni res pa je" 


	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	




Police were alerted early Sunday by a member of the public about a suspicious person carrying a bow and arrow. Officers thereupon conducted an ID check on Rausch, who was described as being 170 centimeters (around 5 feet, 7 inches) tall, bald, with a goatee beard and needing glasses.

Officials said the suspect initially cooperated but then suddenly pulled a gun on the officers, threatening them and forcing them to hand over their service weapons. Nobody was injured in the incident, about 30 kilometers (19 miles) from Germany’s border with France.

Rausch is believed to have been living in the forest for weeks, according to the regional police office in Offenburg.


	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						Manhunt in Germany for man who disarmed 4 police officers
					
				

				Hundreds of German police are involved in a manhunt for a 31-year-old man in camouflage clothing who disarmed four officers at gunpoint and then fled into the forest with a pistol, knife and a bow and arrow

				
					
						
							
						
					
					abcnews.go.com
author: Matey

content: Seveda so v tem primeru takoj javno na voljo vsi osebni podatki osumljenca, vključno z njegovo sliko.
author: Mr_Wolf

content: So ga imeli v postopku, kar pomeni, da so ze imeli ime in priimek...potem jo je ucvrl...oni pa do njegovih ta starih po sliko in dali javno, ce ga bo kdo videl, da bo takoj javil. To je moje mnenje...
author: Cash

content: A se spomnete bosanca, ki je pred enimi 20 leti haral po naših gozdovih (kamniška bistrica, logarska) in ga policija nikakor ni mogla ujeti en 14 dni?

		Klikni za razširitev
	

Ja, sam on je res imel izkušnje iz Bosne, pa najprej so mislili da je en hrvat, pol se je izkazalo da je bosanec... kolk jih je on umoril 4?

Mal nam je bilo neugodno v Kamniškem koncu, ko so ga lovili gor v hribih, pa preletavanje helikopterja, policija...

tega se spomnem. kolko je blo policistov na cestah po savinjski. skor v vsakem kraju so stali pa pregledali ti avto. 
so stali na glavni cesti pri mozirju, potem so pa tega ustrelili par ur za tem na makedam. cesti ene 300-400m zracne linije stran.
author: matej_

content:
'Black Forest Rambo' arrested after five-day manhunt in Germany





	
	
		
		
			Juergen Rieger, the head of the search operation said that Rausch was found sitting in a bush "with four guns visible in front of him", after a tip-off from two witnesses, Agence France-Presse news agency reported.
Reiger added that Rausch had an ax in his lap, another gun, and there was a letter in front of him, AFP reported.
Friday's arrest ends a five-day search that gripped the local area.
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	


	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						'Black Forest Rambo' arrested after five-day manhunt in Germany | CNN
					
				

				A man nicknamed “Black Forest Rambo” has been arrested in Germany’s southwest Black Forest region after five days on the run, Baten-Wurttemberg police said Friday.

				
					
						
							
						
					
					edition.cnn.com
author: Matey

content:
Mislim, da je njegova mati opravičevala dejanje s tem, da naj bi se fant zbal policistov, saj je pred leti sedel, ker je nekoga ustrelil z lokom.   

Sicer pa miren fantič, baje, da se ukvarja z oblikovanjem lesenih spominkov.
